titles.title: MAZE in Transit Act
A bill to amend chapter 53 of title 49, United States Code, to incorporate zero-emission fueling technology into the definition of "capital project".
MAZE in Transit Act
More Access to ZEV Equipment in Transit Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

term.name: Hybrid, electric, and advanced technology vehicles

bill.summary:
More Access to ZEV Equipment in Transit Act or the MAZE in Transit Act
This bill modifies the definition of capital project to make zero-emission vehicle fueling technology projects eligible for federal funding. A zero-emission vehicle is defined as a low or no emission vehicle that produces no carbon or particulate matter.
